export const ChatErrorEvent = defineEvent({
  meta: {
    key: 'ai-chat.error',
    version: '1.0.0',
    description: 'Chat error occurred',
    stability: 'stable',
    owners: ['@ai-chat'],
    tags: ['ai-chat', 'error'],

    name: 'ChatErrorPayload',

      message: { type: ScalarTypeEnum.String_unsecure(), isOptional: false },
